author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Elecosoft Says ‍Revenue And Pre-Tax Profit Trading For FY 2017 To Be In Line With Expectations​
text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Elecosoft Plc:
* REVENUE AND PROFIT BEFORE TAX TRADING FOR FY 2017 ARE EXPECTED TO BE SIGNIFICANTLY HIGHER COMPARED WITH 2016 AND IN LINE WITH EXPECTATIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
